nodes.text: This OOM-series battle droid command battle droid was on board Count Dooku's Providence-class carrier/destroyer above Toydaria in 21 BBY. Count Dooku ordered this OOM command battle droid to destroy Savage Opress, a Force-sensitive assassin who betrayed the Count. After a brief skirmish, this droid and most of his droid troops were all destroyed by Opress.
